Keju Amerika Serikat Dinobatkan Jadi yang Terbaik di Dunia
04 Nov 2019, 06:11 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi: Rogue River Blue, keju asal Amerika Serikat, dinobatkan menjadi keju terbaik di dunia 2019-2020.(Istockphoto/Zakharova_Natalia)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Rogue River Blue, keju asal Amerika Serikat, dinobatkan menjadi keju terbaik di dunia 2019-2020. Gelar itu didapatkan sebagai hadiah utama dalam World Cheese Awards 2019.Rogue River Blue juga menjadi keju Amerika Serikat pertama yang memenangkan penghargaan tersebut. Biasanya, status keju terbaik di dunia disandang negara-negara Eropa seperti Norwegia (2018, 2016), Cornwall Inggris (2017, 2014), dan Swiss sebanyak empat kali.Rogue River Blue merupakan blue cheese organik yang diproduksi Rogue Creamery di Central Point, Oregon, Amerika Serikat. Keju tersebut mengalahkan 3.804 pesaing yang berasal dari 42 negara.Keju-keju tersebut dinilai 260 juri yang berasal dari 35 negara dan dipilih menjadi 16 besar. Setelah itu, seorang juri utama internasional memilih pemenang utama dalam acara penghargaan yang diselenggarakan di Bergamo, Italia tersebut.Dari 16 besar, Rogue River Blue menjadi keju terbaik di dunia. Posisi kedua ditempati Nazionale del Parmigiano Reggiano Latteria Sociale Santo Stefano, keju asal Italia yang berusia 24 bulan.Posisi ketiga diisi oleh Torta del Casar D.O.P. Virgen Del Prado keju asal Spanyol yang dibuat Queseria Doña Francisca dari susu domba mentah.Pakar keju Janet Fletcher menilai wajar Rogue River Blue menjadi keju terbaik di dunia. Ia mengatakan keju tersebut juga telah memenangkan kompetisi di Amerika Serikat sebelumnya."Yang saya suka dari Rogue River Blue, selain rasanya, adalah usaha Rogue Creamery menonjolkan bahan-bahan lokal seperti anggur dan pir. Sebuah usaha yang membuat keju ini terasa luar biasa," ucap Jane Fletcher.Bruno Cabral, juri asal Brasil, juga mengatakan Rogue River Blue memiliki rasa yang ramai dan memberikan banyak sensasi dari manis bahkan pedas yang seimbang.Rogue River Blue dibuat dari susu sapi organik yang kemudian disimpan 9-11 bulan dalam gua keju dan dibungkus dengan daun anggur Syrah organik yang telah dibasahi dengan cairan buah pir.Rogue River Blue dijual USD75 atau Rp1,05 juta(kurs USD1=Rp14 ribu) untuk 1/4 lingkaran apabila dibeli langsung di Rogue Creamery. Namun, keju ini juga dijual di toko-toko keju seperti Murray's Cheese di New York atau Tomales Bay Foods di California. (chr/chs)

United States Cheese Crowned to Be the Best in the World
Nov 04 2019, 06:11 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration: Rogue River Blue, cheese from the United States, has been named the best cheese in the world 2019-2020. (Istockphoto / Zakharova_Natalia)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Rogue River Blue, cheese from the United States, has been named the best cheese in the world 2019-2020. The title was obtained as the main prize at the 2019 World Cheese Awards. Rogue River Blue was also the first American cheese to win the award. Usually, the status of the best cheese in the world is carried by European countries such as Norway (2018, 2016), Cornwall England (2017, 2014), and Switzerland four times. Rogue River Blue is an organic blue cheese produced by Rogue Creamery in Central Point, Oregon , United States of America. The cheese beat 3,804 competitors from 42 countries. The cheese was rated by 260 judges from 35 countries and was chosen to be the top 16. After that, an international grand jury chose the main winner in the award ceremony which was held in Bergamo, Italy. From the top 16, Rogue River Blue became the best cheese in the world. The second position is occupied Nazionale del Parmigiano Reggiano Latteria Sociale Santo Stefano, a 24-month-old Italian cheese. The third position is filled by Torta del Casar D.O.P. Virgen Del Prado of Spanish cheese made by Queseria Doña Francisca from raw sheep's milk. Janet Fletcher's cheese is considered reasonable for Rogue River Blue to be the best cheese in the world. He said the cheese had also won competitions in the United States before. "What I like about Rogue River Blue, in addition to its taste, is Rogue Creamery's efforts to highlight local ingredients such as grapes and pears. An effort that makes this cheese taste extraordinary," said Jane Fletcher. Bruno Cabral, a Brazilian jury, also said Rogue River Blue has a lively taste and provides many sensations from balanced sweet and even spicy. Rogue River Blue is made from organic cow's milk which is then stored 9-11 months in a cheese cave and wrapped in organic Syrah vine leaves that have been moistened with pear liquid. Rogue River Blue sells for USD75 or Rp1.05 million (exchange rate USD1 = Rp14 thousand) for a quarter circle when purchased directly at Rogue Creamery. However, this cheese is also sold in cheese shops such as Murray's Cheese in New York or Tomales Bay Foods in California. (chr / chs)
